biocontainers.name: cellxgene
biocontainers.summary: Web application for exploration of large scale scrna-seq datasets

biotools.summary: cellxgene (pronounced "cell-by-gene") is an interactive data explorer for single-cell transcriptomics datasets, such as those coming from the Human Cell Atlas.

bioschemas.name: cellxgene
bioschemas.summary: cellxgene (pronounced "cell-by-gene") is an interactive data explorer for single-cell transcriptomics datasets, such as those coming from the Human Cell Atlas.
